catalog_info.title: Issues in Human Evolution
catalog_info.notes: Limited to graduate students in Human Evolutionary Biology. Must be taken while auditing Science of Living Systems 16.
catalog_info.prereq: Course open to Graduate Students Only
catalog_info.description: A discussion course for graduate students in Human Evolutionary Biology. Topics will include origins of hominids, radiation of hominins, origins of the genus Homo, and origins of Homo sapiens.
